content.prompt: Rodin’s The Burghers of Calais is similar to Donatello’s David in that both sculptures

choices.label: use classical nudity to emphasize the heroism of the victor
represent unlikely heroes acting to protect their cities
were commissioned by wealthy patrons for a private garden
depict biblical scenes that symbolize contemporary events

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain how two or more works of art are similar and/or different in how they convey meaning.
